backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no state or backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing background-clarity-related features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including timers, backgrounds, media utilities, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme tokens for light/dark modes and global background/foreground variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading Quicksand font and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component wiring background, music, and timer modes with settings and share sheet UI.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/Backgr: UI for selecting image, video, URL, or YouTube backgrounds with validation, error handling, and clear actions.
Context provider wrapping useBackground and revoking old blob URLs to manage background state and cleanup.
Renders full-screen image, video, or YouTube backgrounds with error handling and no dimming overlay.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/mediaS: Utilities for inferring media types, validating URLs, extracting extensions, probing image/video loadability, and generating error messages.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/useBac: React hook managing background media state, loading from files or URLs, probing media, handling YouTube, and persisting settings.
frontend/src/features/backgrounds/youtub: Parses YouTube URLs to extract video IDs and builds optimized YouTube embed URLs.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicProvide: Context provider exposing music playback state and controls via useMusic.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicSetting: UI component for configuring music source URLs, volume, and clearing playback with validation and error display.
frontend/src/features/music/MusicStage.t: Handles playback of direct audio or embedded Spotify/Apple Music using hidden elements and error handling.
frontend/src/features/music/musicSupport: Parses music URLs to classify them as Spotify, Apple Music, or direct audio and constructs embed URLs with error helpers.
frontend/src/features/music/useMusic.ts: React hook managing music source parsing, audio element volume, error handling, and persistence in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/Publi: UI sheet that displays the current URL, allows copying or opening it, and shows publishing instructions with embedded-preview awareness.
frontend/src/features/publishShare/useIs: Hook that detects whether the app is running inside an iframe using a safety-checked window comparison.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/C: Countdown timer UI letting users set hours/minutes/seconds and control start, pause, and reset.
frontend/src/features/timers/countdown/u: Hook implementing countdown logic with pause/resume, localStorage persistence, and accurate interval timing.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/In: Interval timer UI showing current interval, rounds, progress, and controls plus editable work/rest durations.
frontend/src/features/timers/interval/us: Hook managing alternating interval timing, rounds, persistence, and skip/reset logic using accurate intervals.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/Po: UI component for the Pomodoro timer, displaying time, controls, segment status, and editable settings.
frontend/src/features/timers/pomodoro/us: Hook managing Pomodoro state, timing, segment transitions, persistence, and settings updates.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/R: UI component for a repeating countdown timer with controls, duration inputs, repeat settings, and infinite mode display.
frontend/src/features/timers/repeating/u: Hook implementing repeating countdown logic with persistence, auto-restart, repeat counting, and infinite mode.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/time: Utility functions to format seconds or milliseconds into human-readable time strings.
frontend/src/features/timers/shared/useA: React hook for stable interval execution that stays accurate across renders.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/S: UI component for a stopwatch with time display, start/pause/reset actions, and lap recording list.
frontend/src/features/timers/stopwatch/u: Hook managing stopwatch timing, lap recording, and interval-based elapsed time updates.
frontend/src/features/timers/visibility/: UI bar allowing the user to toggle overall timer visibility.
Hook managing timer visibility state with persistence and auto-hide behavior based on background activity.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a React Query-managed backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth state, loading stored identities, and handling login/logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color variables, themes, and utility classes for typography and timer display.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata including features, issues, design notes, and summary of the timer appâ€™s current state.
